nodes.text: Fangworms were a species of parasitic worm that lived in colonies in the intestines of happabores. Infections of the parasite in happabores could be treated with Happy-Bore Medicated Dewormer, a product produced by Galacti-Stok which contained Trestibinexocycline 5-Gamma, thlank oil, greel-root acid and forage products. Use of the dewormer on intestinal fangworm colonies was suggested in the instructions for the product.
Fangworms were first mentioned in Rey's Survival Guide, a replica journal written by Jason Fry and released in 2015.
